topic-1.user_query: Recently, I've been experiencing severe hair loss. What should I do?
implicit_needs: Seeking effective solutions for hair loss issues.
Adjusting lifestyle habits to alleviate physical problems caused by high pressure
topic-1.requirement: The user wants to learn specific methods to effectively address hair loss issues and seeks guidance on improving physiological conditions caused by long-term high stress through adjustments in daily routines, diet, and other lifestyle factors.

pos: Gently massage the scalp with your fingertips for 5-10 minutes every morning and evening to promote blood circulation and reduce hair loss.
Consistently take B vitamins and collagen daily, while consulting a doctor about whether additional nutritional supplements are needed.
neg: Try using silicone-free shampoo and reduce hair washing frequency to 2-3 times per week to avoid over-cleansing.
Keep a diet and sleep diary to observe and adjust lifestyle habits that may cause hair loss.

candidate_solutions.solution: Gently massage your scalp with your fingertips for 5-10 minutes every morning and evening to promote blood circulation and reduce hair loss.
Try using silicone-free shampoo and reduce hair washing frequency to 2-3 times per week to avoid over-cleansing.
Increasing the intake of iron- and zinc-rich foods, such as spinach, shellfish, and lean meats, can help improve the health of hair follicles.
Ensure 7-8 hours of sleep each night and try to fall asleep before 11 PM to maintain endocrine balance.
Practice yoga or meditation to alleviate long-term stress, thereby indirectly reducing stress-related hair loss.
Consistently supplement with B vitamins and collagen daily, while consulting a doctor to determine if additional nutritional supplements are needed.
Reduce the use of high-heat tools (such as hair dryers, curling irons) and the frequency of dyeing and perming to minimize physical damage to the hair.
Keep a diet and sleep diary to observe and adjust lifestyle habits that may cause hair loss.

策划一次家庭游戏夜或观影活动，创造更多共同回忆加强亲情纽带。
neg: Create a detailed luggage checklist, including important items such as gifts and documents, to ensure nothing is overlooked.
Prepare some small topics or stories in advance to engage in in-depth discussions with family about future plans, demonstrating a sense of responsibility and fostering closer bonds.

candidate_solutions.solution: Print out your train tickets and related travel information for the Spring Festival homecoming in advance, and keep electronic backups to prevent loss.
Pay attention to weather forecasts and prepare appropriate clothing and essentials according to the destination's climate to avoid unexpected situations.
Create a detailed luggage checklist, including important items such as gifts and documents, to ensure nothing is overlooked.
Before departure, check the traffic conditions near your hometown and identify potential congested road sections to plan your travel time appropriately.
Use the Spring Festival period to cook or do household chores with family members to enhance interaction and emotional bonding.
Plan a family game night or movie viewing activity to create more shared memories and strengthen family bonds.
Take the initiative to care for your parents' needs and understand their specific thoughts on home renovation or other matters during conversations.
Prepare some small topics or stories in advance to have in-depth discussions with family members about future plans, demonstrating a sense of responsibility and drawing closer together.
